summary: This document is a financial statement from Fifth Third Bank detailing the account activity for Blue Chip Capital LLC for the period of March 1, 2015, to March 31, 2015. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and the ending balance, along with service charge details and account management information.

persons.name: Helene Tolentino
persons.context: Helene Tolentino is identified as the relationship manager for the business account at Fifth Third Bank.

locations: Fifth Third Bank, P.O. Box 630900, Cincinnati, OH 43263-0900
Blue Chip Capital LLC, 27 High Tech Blvd, Thomasville, NC 27360-5560
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $102,007.94 and an ending balance of $29,926.33 for the statement period.
A total of $100,000 was withdrawn via an outgoing wire transfer on March 30, 2015.
There were two mobile check deposits totaling $30,000 and $25,000 during the statement period.
The standard monthly service charge of $11.00 was waived due to meeting balance criteria.
The total combined monthly average balance across accounts was $143,868.67.
